content: निबंध् {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bind, tie, fasten, chain, fetter; आत्मवंतं न कर्माणि निबध्नंति धनंजय <ls>Bg. 4. 41</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">9. 9</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">14. 7</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">18. 17</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 14</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 10.</ls> {@--2@} To fix upon, rivet; त्वयि निबद्धरतेः <ls>V. 4. 29</ls>, <ls>Bh. 3. 87.</ls> {@--3@} To join, unite, connect; <ls>R. 13. 15.</ls> {@--4@} To form, build, construct, arrange; हेमनिबद्धं चक्रं, पाषाणचयबद्धः कूपः &c. {@--5@} To write, compose, मया निबद्धेयमतिद्वयी कथा <ls>K. 5.</ls> {@--6@} To restrain, obstruct. {@--7@} To fix upon, impose. {@--8@} To appoint. {@--9@} To place, locate.
